comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to leave only AdGuard filters from your config, clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

Not reproduced on my end.
Try to leave only AdGuard filters from your config, clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

@Jameyers4 you can also try this before sending an email if it doesn't help.

---

Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

Try to leave only AdGuard filters from your config, clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.title: lordsmobile.igg.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://lordsmobile.igg.com/event/shrekcollab_picture/?lang=en](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Flordsmobile.igg.com%2Fevent%2Fshrekcollab_picture%2F%3Flang%3Den) ### Comment > Turning on AdGuard vpn. Switch to VPN profile, vpn profile says IPsec is turned off. When I turn it on, the AdGuard VPN is turned off. When I press connect on AdGuard VPN mobile apps. I looked at VPN profile it says it’s turned off. “On demand connect” is also turned off. AdGuard tech support told me to delete the VPN profile under AdGuard Pro. Under AdGuard Pro the DNS turns off when I delete the VPN profile in AdGuard Pro. I turn on DNS under AdGuard Pro. To reinstall AdGuard VPN under VPN profile. When I look at VPN profile. It says it’s turned off. When I connect under VPN profile. I go to AdGuard VPN it says it’s disconnect. When I connect it on AdGuard VPN. I look in iPhone settings under VPN profile says AdGuard VPN under iPhone settings VPN profile it says it’s disconnected. > > When I press connect on VPN profile, when I look at AdGuard VPN says disconnected. When I connect AdGuard VPN on AdGuard VPN apps. When I look in iPhone settings under VPN profile it says it’s disconnected. > > When one says disconnect, when I press connect. I look on the other apps says it’s disconnect. It repeats over and over. ### [NSFW] Screenshots

Switch to VPN profile, vpn profile says IPsec is turned off. When I turn it on, the AdGuard VPN is turned off. When I press connect on AdGuard VPN mobile apps. I looked at VPN profile it says it’s turned off. “On demand connect” is also turned off. AdGuard tech support told me to delete the VPN profile under AdGuard Pro. Under AdGuard Pro the DNS turns off when I delete the VPN profile in AdGuard Pro. I turn on DNS under AdGuard Pro. To reinstall AdGuard VPN under VPN profile. When I look at VPN profile. It says it’s turned off. When I connect under VPN profile. I go to AdGuard VPN it says it’s disconnect. When I connect it on AdGuard VPN. I look in iPhone settings under VPN profile says AdGuard VPN under iPhone settings VPN profile it says it’s disconnected. > > When I press connect on VPN profile, when I look at AdGuard VPN says disconnected. When I connect AdGuard VPN on AdGuard VPN apps. When I look in iPhone settings under VPN profile it says it’s disconnected. > > When one says disconnect, when I press connect. This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.

Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
@SmileFate Hi. In general settings are ok. 

I don't recommend to use Web Annoyances Ultralist. Sometimes it breaks sites. Please test when this filter is disabled (it is removed from preinstalled filters list).
